rolecraft.cmd.help.line3: /rolecraft role level  - shows role level and XP
rolecraft.cmd.help.line4: /rolecraft role level <player>  - shows player's level and XP (OP only)
rolecraft.cmd.adminui.todo: Admin UI is not implemented yet.
rolecraft.cmd.error.nodata: RoleCraft: no role/job data for this player.
rolecraft.cmd.set.role.target: Your role has been set to %s
rolecraft.cmd.set.job.target: Your job has been set to %s
rolecraft.medic.no_uses: This medkit has no uses left.
rolecraft.medic.heal.cancel.no_item: Healing cancelled: you must hold a medkit.
rolecraft.medic.heal.cancel.not_medic: Healing cancelled: you are no longer a Medic.
rolecraft.medic.heal.cancel.too_far: Healing cancelled: target walked too far away.
rolecraft.tooltip.bandage.title: Bandage
rolecraft.tooltip.bandage.shift1: Right click and hold to heal yourself (small heal).
rolecraft.tooltip.bandage.shift2: Tip: Medkit heals better and longer.
rolecraft.tooltip.medkit.title: Medkit
rolecraft.tooltip.medkit.shift1: Right click and hold to heal yourself.
rolecraft.tooltip.medkit.shift2: SHIFT + Right click a player to start healing (15s).
rolecraft.tooltip.medkit.shift3: Healing cancels if you move, get hit, or walk too far.
rolecraft.tooltip.handcuffs.title: Handcuffs
rolecraft.tooltip.handcuffs.shift1: Right click a player to cuff/uncuff (with time).
rolecraft.tooltip.handcuffs.shift2: SHIFT + Right click a cuffed player to search inventory.
rolecraft.tooltip.handcuffs.shift3: Cuffing cancels if you move, get hit, or walk too far.
rolecraft.police.not_police: You are not a Police officer.
rolecraft.police.busy: You are already performing an action.
rolecraft.police.cancel.no_item: Cancelled: you are not holding handcuffs.
rolecraft.police.cuffed.no_break: You can't break blocks while cuffed.
rolecraft.police.search.title: Search: %s
rolecraft.blacksmith.enchant.only_blacks: Only a Blacksmith can use the enchanting table.
rolecraft.blacksmith.enchant.need_lvl10: You need Blacksmith level 10 to use enchanting.
rolecraft.blacksmith.enchant.locked: This enchanting tier is locked for your level.
rolecraft.blacksmith.craft_enchant_forbi: Only a Blacksmith (min. level 10) can craft an enchanting table.
rolecraft.blacksmith.work.blocked: You are working. Press ESC to cancel.
